Instance.description: Tuning information for ranked statistics that use the PerksPanel.

TunableList.name: perks_panel_bucks_perk_info
TunableList.description: A mapping of bucks type to info for that bucks type.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The buck type this data corresponds to.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Info used to display Bucks and BucksPerks in the Perks Panel.

TunableVariant.name: bucks_text
TunableVariant.description: Text containing a currency type token, to display the bucks balance in the Perks Panel. If not present, the points balance for this buck type won't be shown in the Perks Panel.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Text containing a currency type token, to display the bucks balance in the Perks Panel. If not present, the points balance for this buck type won't be shown in the Perks Panel.

TunableVariant.name: bucks_tooltip
TunableVariant.description: Tooltip on the 'Help' icon related for this buck type in the Perks Panel. Explains how this currency works. Can be none if no additional information is needed for this buck type.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Tooltip on the 'Help' icon related for this buck type in the Perks Panel. Explains how this currency works. Can be none if no additional information is needed for this buck type.

TunableVariant.name: perk_currency_label
TunableVariant.description: Title text to display currency type on the Motive Panel. Such as 'Power Points:' in 'Power Points: 10' Can be none if we don't need to show this buck's balance on the Motive Panel.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Title text to display currency type on the Motive Panel. Such as 'Power Points:' in 'Power Points: 10' Can be none if we don't need to show this buck's balance on the Motive Panel.

TunableVariant.name: perk_remove_tooltip
TunableVariant.description: Tooltip on the removal button on the perk cell in the Perks Panel. Can be none if perks don't need a special removal tooltip.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Tooltip on the removal button on the perk cell in the Perks Panel. Can be none if perks don't need a special removal tooltip.

TunableVariant.name: perks_panel_disabled_confirm_tooltip
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, allows tuning the tooltip shown on the confirm button in the perks panel when it is disabled.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The tooltip shown on the confirm button in the perks panel when it is disabled.

TunableVariant.name: perks_panel_revert_tooltip
TunableVariant.description: Tooltip shown on the revert button in the Perks Panel. If not present, the revert button is unused and hidden.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Tooltip shown on the revert button in the Perks Panel. If not present, the revert button is unused and hidden.

TunableVariant.name: perks_panel_subtitle
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, allows tuning the subtitle shown in the Perks Panel for this statistic.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The subtitle shown in the Perks Panel for this statistic.

TunableVariant.name: perks_panel_title
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, allows tuning the title shown in the Perks Panel for this statistic.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The title shown in the Perks Panel for this statistic.

Tunable.name: ranked_statistic_reference
Tunable.description: The ranked statistic gameplay tuning reference ID.

TunableVariant.name: sim_info_panel_icons
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, allows tuning icons that will show on the Sim Info panel when there are changes in rank for this Ranked Statistic.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: The icons that will show on the Sim Info panel when there are changes in rank for this Ranked Statistic.

Tunable.name: default_icon
Tunable.description: The icon to use on the Sim Info panel when there are changes to this Ranked Statistic.

Tunable.name: over_icon
Tunable.description: The icon to use on the Sim Info panel when there are changes to this Ranked Statistic and the mouse is over the button.

TunableVariant.name: sim_info_panel_icons_negative
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, allows tuning icons that will show on the Sim Info panel when there are negatives changes in rank for this Ranked Statistic. If there are positive changes in rank while this is enabled, Sim Info Panel Icons will be used. If this is disabled, Sim Info Panel Icons will be used for both positive and negative changes.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: The icons that will show on the Sim Info panel when there are negative changes in rank for this Ranked Statistic.

Tunable.name: default_icon
Tunable.description: The icon to use on the Sim Info panel when there are changes to this Ranked Statistic.

Tunable.name: over_icon
Tunable.description: The icon to use on the Sim Info panel when there are changes to this Ranked Statistic and the mouse is over the button.
